sentences.english: Apply BF1 Hair Growth Conditioner onto scalp. Gently massage for 5 minutes then rinse Off.

sentences.english: He is going to scalp me or burn me at the stake.

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions, would be the scurf of yesterday's.

sentences.english: Tinea capitis is manifested by pustular eruptions of the scalp, with scaling and bald patches.

sentences.english: Helen: Well, if you do something wrong, you could say ‘I didn’t finish my work, so I have to face the music.’
